project_description: Trapped Egypt - Escape Room Booking Platform for the New Cairo branch. A high-conversion, mobile-first landing page with a dark cinematic theme, real-time booking system, and admin dashboard.

frontend.ui_components: Radix UI (Dialog, Select, Tabs, etc.) + shadcn/ui

public_pages.name: Home Page
public_pages.description: Landing page with hero carousel, room cards, how-it-works section, and CTA. Fetches rooms from Supabase.

public_pages.name: Rooms Page
public_pages.description: Grid display of all active escape rooms with offer badges. Fetches rooms and active offers from Supabase.

public_pages.name: Room Detail Page
public_pages.description: Individual room details with images, difficulty, player count, duration, and pricing. Links to booking page.

public_pages.name: Booking Page
public_pages.description: Multi-step booking flow: select date, time slot, player count, enter customer info, apply promo code, and submit. Real-time availability checking.

public_pages.name: Confirmation Page
public_pages.description: Post-booking confirmation showing booking details, total price, and contact options.

public_pages.name: Events Page
public_pages.description: Special events overview with cards for Corporate, School Trips, and Birthday events.

public_pages.name: Contact Page
public_pages.description: Contact form (name, email, phone, message) and direct contact options (phone, WhatsApp, email).

public_pages.name: Find Us Page
public_pages.description: Location page with embedded Google Maps, address, opening hours, and social media links.

admin_pages.name: Admin Login
admin_pages.description: Supabase email/password authentication for admin access.

admin_pages.name: Admin Dashboard
admin_pages.description: Overview dashboard with booking statistics and charts.

admin_pages.name: Admin Calendar
admin_pages.description: Calendar view for managing bookings by date with the ability to create bookings.

admin_pages.name: Admin Bookings
admin_pages.description: Manage all bookings with status updates and internal notes.

admin_pages.name: Admin Pricing
admin_pages.description: Manage pricing tiers and promo codes.

admin_pages.name: Admin External Customers
admin_pages.description: Customer explorer with external API sync, search, date range filtering, and CSV export.

services.name: Booking Service
services.description: Core business logic layer - CRUD operations for rooms, bookings, time slots, and promo codes via Supabase.

services.name: Pricing Engine
services.description: Dynamic pricing calculation, promo code validation, and offer management.

services.name: External Customer Service
services.description: Integration with external API for customer data sync and management.

services.name: Event Service
services.description: Event lead management and inquiry handling.

services.name: Analytics
services.description: Meta Pixel and Google Analytics tracking integration.

services.name: Room Adapter
services.description: Transforms raw Supabase room data into frontend-friendly format with i18n support.

services.name: Supabase Client
services.description: Supabase client initialization with environment variables.

shared_components.name: Navbar
shared_components.description: Global navigation with links to Rooms, Events, Find Us, Contact, and Book Now CTA. Language switcher (EN/AR).

shared_components.name: Footer
shared_components.description: Site footer with contact info, opening hours, social links, and copyright.

shared_components.name: RoomCard
shared_components.description: Reusable room card component showing room image, name, difficulty, player count, and offer badge.

shared_components.name: HeroBackgroundCarousel
shared_components.description: Auto-playing background image carousel for the home page hero section.

shared_components.name: UI Components (shadcn)
shared_components.description: 47 shadcn/ui components including Button, Input, Dialog, Select, Tabs, Calendar, Toast, etc.
